summary:
Here are bra, panties, stocking, garter belt & high heels (black & white).
These are craftable at jewelry.

You can wear these with other armor,boots.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i] [size=14]Introduction[/size][/i][/b]

I can't speak English well.

This is a conversion of "R18PN 02 - Lingerie Set for HGEC" in Oblivion mode.
Original author is R18PN AKA KURESE.
Original link : [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/23589]http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/23589[/url]

[color=yellow]She was written "Please use this MOD freely".[/color]

This Mod has Lingerie Set - CBBE 3.2.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/HbCfC.jpg[/img]

[b][i] [size=14]Caution[/size][/i][/b]

[color=red]My skyrim version is 1.8.151. I made a esp file with newest CK.[/color]
[color=red]If your version is lower than 1.8, you have nothing in craft list, console(help command).[/color]
[color=red]You must update new version.[/color]

[color=yellow]The hair and the face of my screenshot is limited distribute mode.
I will not answer questions about this.[/color]

My face texture is here.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27215]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27215[/url]
She upload it to Nexus.

[b][i] [size=14]Description[/size][/i][/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/HJIl0.jpg[/img]

[color=yellow]It supports the weight slider.[/color]

Here are bra, panties, stocking, garter belt & high heels (black & white).
These are craftable at jewelry.

You can wear these with other armor,boots.

[color=yellow]You can find that begin with "-LS- ..".[/color]

[b][i] [size=14]Compatibility[/size][/i][/b]

It was created based on CBBE 3.2 default.
It is compatible CBBE3. (If you are CBBE3 user, you will use it without CBBE 3.2 body.)

[b][i] [size=14]Permissions[/size][/i][/b]

You can use freely.

[b][i] [size=14]Credit[/size][/i][/b]

Special thanks to R18PN.
author: Nausicaa
